system.description:
This is the more advanced version of a basic reloading kit, containing contains all of the tools necessary for reloading small arms ammunition, including an automatic powder trickler, a turret reloading press with case, bullet and primer feeders, a digital scale, a case cleaner and polisher, a case resizer, a bullet puller and ballistics reference manuals, as well as the various dies needed to reload all kinds of ammunition. It allows a character to reload ammunition at a much faster rate and more accurately than the basic kit. It reduces the time it takes to reload a batch
of ammo to 2 hours, and grants a +3 bonus to all Craft checks
involving reloading.
